condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Project Implementation Manual | Description :The Recipient shall ensure and cause the Project ImplementingEntity to, not later than two (2) months of the Effective Date, adopt a Project Implementation Manual containing detailedguidelines and procedures for the implementation of the Project. | Due Date :01-Aug-2016
